attributes.action: postpone ULEZ zone expansion for another 24 months
attributes.additional_details: To Postpone expansion for another 24 months as business was affected badly by the Covid19 situation, a lot of businesses are struggling to purchase new vehicles.
attributes.background: all Diesel vehicles with non complaint engines ( Euro 6 )  to be allowed in the London ULEZ expanded zone commencing October 2021

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Mayor of London and the Greater London Authority.
